title: Block ID Proof of Concept (POC) Guide
description: It is our understanding that this project is much more than a Proof of Concept. It is designed to be a hands-on, practical exercising of the technology and processes needed to validate the solution will work both technically as well as for the business. With this in mind, we want the solution design to reflect the end-state architecture needed to effectively scale as well as address the unique needs of managing acquired entities.
